title: wtsimis
author: wtsimis
content: A meme refers to an idea, behavior, or style that spreads utilizing imitation from person to person within a culture and often carries symbolic meaning representing a particular phenomenon or theme. In general, anyone can represent one's ideas, thoughts, and stories can share through this culture. Memes can represent social imbalances, irregularities, and inequalities.  This medium is a good form of rising our thoughts in form of symbolic culture or manner.The journey of meme threads in Bitcointalk is started by libert19.  This user took the memes to another level in the forum. The consistency of posting memes on regular basis from the beginning made the memes thread more entertaining. The first memes thread are created by libert19 on 15 March 2020 called 'Bitcointalk Memes', where memes are posted about the Bitcointalk forum, and another memes thread was created on Feb 7 2021 called 'Crypto memes', where crypto releted memes are posted. From the beginning, libert19 tried to post on a routine basis and made us laugh. I just summarize all the memes and create a memes portfolio to show an example, of how a memer can make laugh other users using a symbolic manner.
